snippet: From the DealBook Spring 2010 Special Section: Many have been skeptical that low-fee funds could reproduce the supposed magic of a real hedge fund. This, however, could be the year they take off at last, Reuters Breakingviews says.
abstract: From the DealBook Spring 2010 Special Section: Many have been skeptical that low-fee funds could reproduce the supposed magic of a real hedge fund. This, however, could be the year they take off at last, Reuters Breakingviews says.
